description: Details of the secure cycle parking pursuant to condition 7  of deemed consent ref: P/2009/4211 dated 30/04/2010 for: Construction of single storey extension with veranda/canopy (KS1 block containing classrooms and other teaching rooms) to southern elevation (following removal of three year 2 classrooms); extensions to the north east elevation to provide additional reception level classroom accommodation; two single storey extensions to north elevation facing properties on southern side of Wyndham Road, one between the gym and reception block to provide a parents rooms and store and one between the main hall and the gym to provide improved reception and staff area; canopy over main entrance to provide bicycle and pushchair storage; four temporary (for 3 years) classroom huts to playing field; and associated hard play areas, refuse storage and external alterations
